Title: Relates to informational notices provided on utility bills
Summary: Requires the public service commission to determine the cost to ratepayers of rules and regulations issued to comply with the New York state climate leadership and community protection act.
LawCode: Amd ยง44, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to informational notices provided on utility bills relating to compliance with the New York state climate leadership and community protection act
